premise_source_doc_sentence: Burundi  (  -LSB- bəˈrʊndi -RSB- or -LSB- bəˈrʌndi -RSB-  )  , officially the Republic of Burundi  (  Republika y' Uburundi , -LSB- buˈɾundi -RSB- République du Burundi , -LSB- buʁundi -RSB- or -LSB- byʁyndi -RSB-  )  , is a landlocked country in the African Great Lakes region of East Africa , bordered by Rwanda to the north , Tanzania to the east and south , and the Democratic Republic of the Congo to the west .
